Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

CoolantConnector.description: This schema describes a liquid coolant connector, including any associated instrumentation.
CoolantConnector.longDescription: This resource shall represent an coolant connector for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

Coolant.description: Details about the coolant used in this unit.
Coolant.longDescription: This property shall contain details regarding the coolant contained or used by this unit.

CoolantConnectorType.longDescription: This property shall contain the type of coolant connector.

CoolingLoopName.description: The name of the cooling loop attached to this interface.
CoolingLoopName.longDescription: This property shall contain the name of the cooling loop attached to this interface.  If the `CoolingLoop` link property is present, this property shall contain the value of the `Id` property in the resource referenced by that link.

CoolingManagerURI.description: The link to the application that manages the cooling loop.
CoolingManagerURI.longDescription: This property shall contain a URI to the application or device that provides administration or management of the cooling loop associated with this interface.

DeltaPressurekPa.longDescription: This property shall contain the pressure, in kilopascal units, for the difference in pressure between the supply and outflow or return connection to the cooling loop.  The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type Sensor with the ReadingType property containing the value `PressurekPa`.

DeltaTemperatureCelsius.longDescription: This property shall contain the change in temperature, in degrees Celsius, between the supply connection and the outflow or return connection to the cooling loop.  The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type Sensor with the ReadingType property containing the value `Temperature`.

FlowLitersPerMinute.longDescription: This property shall contain the liquid flow rate, in liters per minute units, for this coolant connector.  The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type Sensor with the ReadingType property containing the value `LiquidFlowLPM`.

HeatRemovedkW.description: The heat removed (kW) through this connector.
HeatRemovedkW.longDescription: This property shall contain the amount of heat removed, in kilowatt units, by the coolant flow through this connector.  The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type Sensor with the ReadingType property containing the value `Heat`.

Links.description: The links to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: This property shall contain links to resources that are related to but are not contained by, or subordinate to, this resource.

LocationIndicatorActive.description: An indicator allowing an operator to physically locate this resource.
LocationIndicatorActive.longDescription: This property shall contain the state of the indicator used to physically identify or locate this resource.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

RatedFlowLitersPerMinute.description: The rated liquid flow (L/min) for this loop interface.
RatedFlowLitersPerMinute.longDescription: This property shall contain the rated liquid flow, in liters per minute units, for this loop interface.

RatedFlowPressurekPa.description: The pressure (kPa) at which the rated liquid flow is valid.
RatedFlowPressurekPa.longDescription: This property shall contain the pressure, in kilopascal units, that the rated liquid flow, is valid for this connector.

RatedPressurekPa.description: The rated pressure (kPa) for this connector.
RatedPressurekPa.longDescription: This property shall contain the rated maximum pressure, in kilopascal units, for this connector.

ReturnPressurekPa.longDescription: This property shall contain the pressure, in kilopascal units, for the outflow or return connection to the cooling loop.  The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type Sensor with the ReadingType property containing the value `PressurekPa`.

ReturnTemperatureCelsius.longDescription: This property shall contain the temperature, in degrees Celsius, for the outflow or return connection to the cooling loop.  The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type Sensor with the ReadingType property containing the value `Temperature`.

Status.description: The status and health of the resource and its subordinate or dependent resources.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the resource.

SupplyPressurekPa.longDescription: This property shall contain the pressure, in kilopascal units, for the intake or supply connection to the cooling loop.  The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type Sensor with the ReadingType property containing the value `PressurekPa`.

SupplyTemperatureCelsius.longDescription: This property shall contain the temperature, in degrees Celsius, for the intake or supply connection to the cooling loop.  The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type Sensor with the ReadingType property containing the value `Temperature`.

enumDescriptions.Inline: An inline connection or measurement point.

Links.description: The links to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: This Redfish Specification-described type shall contain links to resources that are related to but are not contained by, or subordinate to, this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ConnectedChassis.description: Any array of links to chassis at the other end of the connection.
ConnectedChassis.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to resources of type Chassis that represent the chassis at the other end of the connection.

ConnectedCoolingLoop.description: A link to the cooling loop at the other end of the connection.
ConnectedCoolingLoop.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource of type CoolingLoop that represents the cooling loop at the other end of the connection.

ConnectedCoolingUnit.description: A link to the cooling unit at the other end of the connection.
ConnectedCoolingUnit.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource of type CoolingUnit that represents the cooling unit at the other end of the connection.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties contained in this object shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

title: #CoolantConnector.v1_0_0.CoolantConnector
